article: Guide to Getting DoorDash Food and Deliveries for Free
intro: DoorDash is a food delivery service that makes it easy to get meals from local stores and restaurants. But the cost of getting food delivered can add up. If you’re wondering how to get free or discounted food from DoorDash, there are a few things you can try. In this article, we’ll talk you through the best ways to find deals, earn gift cards or credits toward your next DoorDash order, and order food with no delivery fee.

steps.title: Be careful of gift card code generators.
steps.subtitle: There are a lot of websites out there that claim to generate gift card numbers for companies like DoorDash. If these offers seem too good to be true, it’s because they are. At best, they usually don’t work, and at worst, some of them can install malicious software on your computer.
sub-points: In addition to steering clear of gift card generators, always research any website or app offering free gift cards before you use it.  involving gift cards are unfortunately very common.

steps.title: Try a DashPass account for free deliveries.
steps.subtitle: DashPass is a premium DoorDash membership program that offers free delivery, discounts, and exclusive offers that are available only to members. You can choose to pay for your DashPass membership annually or on a monthly basis. There’s also a 1-month free trial available.
sub-points: DoorDash offers a DashPass membership at a lower rate for students. You’ll need to be currently enrolled at a college or university to qualify.
To sign up for DashPass on the DoorDash website, visit the page and select a plan.
If you’re using the DoorDash app, tap the  button in the lower right corner of the screen, then tap  at the top of the menu. Follow the prompts to select a plan or tap  at the bottom of the screen.
